channel.title: Z.epsity with some fixes and better combat / switches
channel.description:
hey guys first i wnana say i didnt do alot to it its just a funny its just z.epsity with some fixes!
1. fixed combat i did alot to it better pvp and pvm 2. fixed 2 dupes and 4 bugs/gliches. 3. better switches. not only that int989 5 to a 10 but mcuh better 4. changed that 2x open pkp shop and changed his name to pkp shop
release page of z.epsity http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=520684.0
downloads
source client - http://adf.ly/JsNIk
cache - http://adf.ly/JsNEE
credits me 10% Sanity 47,5% Myself 17,5% Im a Jerk 7,5% Everyone Else 17,5%
